about_the_game:
Welcome to the prototype Project Unknown Designation, the first game of its kind by Diggidy. If a full version is made, expect a thrilling adventure filled with puzzles, multiple storylines, and a deeply immersive plot.

Plot Overview:
You and your friends planned a fun getaway at a secluded cabin in the woods. But as you arrive late, you sense something is amiss. Your friends are nowhere to be found, and an eerie silence fills the air.

Gameplay:
Navigate the Woods: Traverse through the dense forest to reach the cabin. Beware of hidden dangers lurking in the shadows.
Investigate the Campsite: Explore the campsite and surrounding areas to uncover clues about what happened to your friends.
Make Critical Choices: Decide whether to stay and search for your friends or find the keys to the truck and make a quick escape.

Features:
Multiple endings based on your choices.
An immersive plot that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

Thank you for playing. Your feedback is invaluable as we work towards creating the full version of the game.

name: Project Unknown Designation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2000 series or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Meet your friends at their cabin in the woods. What lies ahead?
